title: Chapter 4 - The AI Brain with NVIDIA Isaac
description: Welcome to Chapter 4, where we explore how the "AI brain" powers humanoid robots. Just as the human brain coordinates thoughts, perceptions, and actions, the AI brain in a robot integrates perception, planning, and control to create intelligent behavior. This chapter introduces NVIDIA Isaac, a powerful platform that provides the computational foundation for these AI systems.
